website_summaries.verdict: Another inexpensive option for those interested in an air vent system for backseat pets.
pros: Includes a small mesh window for pets to look through
Bottom of product features lower net venting to keep pets cool and comfortable
Option to purchase in different colors
cons: Has trouble keeping larger dogs in place
Straps can be hard to adjust

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Just received this item and was easily installed in my toyota highlander. I have 3 large dogs and 1 small and its the small one who likes to boomerang between the back and front seats constantly, its like watching ping pong. This seat barrier did the trick, now she sits there without all the zinging back n forth. What i like about this barrier is it's not obtrusive and not an eyesore. Very functional design. Peaceful driving again, thanks Petfect.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P

customer_reviews.title: Even My Dog Likes it.
customer_reviews.text: There are many products out there to help when you transport your pet. Some are cumbersome, some are hard to install or to fit the area you need too. Lets face it, not all vehicles are built a like. This is not the first product I have tried but it is the best one. Takes no time at all to install, and is easily adjustable to most any vehicle. I have a Toyota Tundra Crew Cab and a P.T. Cruiser. Now have the PETFECT in them now. My dog likes it as she has no problem seeing me, I like it and it is a clear value quality item. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Col. Walt. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Really Works (but no instructions)
customer_reviews.text: This really works in keeping my inquisitive dog (boxer/ beagle mix, 70 lbs) from leaning into the front and drooling on the storage panel. I deducted one star because mine came completely without directions (I had to read the reviews and pictures to see how it was supposed to attach). Also, it barely fit across the front seat headrest stands (2014 Mazda 6); I had to loosen it as far as it would go and still hold tight. Nitpicking aside, this really works in keeping the dog in the backseat where he belongs for our safety while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfect - Works Great
customer_reviews.text: My old barrier broke when I took it off to put in my new car. I bought this one, hoping it would work. It looked a little flimsy in the picture, but it's amazing. It has 4 simple clips that fit around each headrest & loop around brackets on the floor. The netting lets the dogs see through, while happily staying in the back. It looks very stylish, doesn't make my new car look shabby. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Like It
customer_reviews.text: I just took down a wire grate divider that was bent and was ineffective for smaller dogs because of side openings. This easy to install soft barrier has been effective in stopping my dogs from jumping into the front seat with a little correction from me. So far I like it better than the wire as it gives me more room in the back and is quick and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: bar

customer_reviews.title: Great for some; not for me.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and if you have a well trained, well behaved dog, or a smaller dog it probably works great. But my headstrong 60 lb Sadie sailed right over it. Apparently, I have to get something higher or train her better. We're going to work on the training first. This one stops right at the headrest. The only reason I really need anything is that she loves rides and during the summer, if I go into a store I'll leave the car running with the A/C on. Well I found out the hard way that she can open the windows. I can lock 3 but the driver's side does not lock.
customer_reviews.author: Irene B

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: My Aussie Shepherd loves to "surf" between our 2 front seats but unfortunately, it also makes her car sick. When I saw this product on Amazon, I figured I'd give it a shot. My Elantra didn't have much for me to hook the bottom straps to so, after performing yoga-like contortions, I had to attach them to the undersides of my front seats. My dog did try to jump over the barricade once but after a stern reprimand, she stopped and laid done on the backseat. I'm happy to say, that thanks to this product, she no longer tries to "surf" nor does she need anti-emetics for riding in the car - hooray!
customer_reviews.author: Metalsister

customer_reviews.title: doesn't fit Dodge Carvan
customer_reviews.text: Not too happy with this. Not made to fit a Dodge Caravan at the bottom Caravan front seats sit on solid metal, so can't really use bungie cords and the attached cords are too short or long, but when you put them around the seat the bottom of this goes into a V shape which will not keep a dog out of the front. Was very disappointed and as we are leaving next week I sure don't have time to mess with returns or trying something else. The top fit fine, but no matter what I tried the bottom does not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Msgtdeb

customer_reviews.title: One car it works great. The other doesn't have a place for the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. One car it works great. The other doesn't have a place for the bottom straps to secure very well, so it doesn't work as well. I would just check out the bottom/back of your front seats before you purchase to make sure there is a place to secure the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is the one
customer_reviews.text: I have a pug who JUST NEEDS TO BE IN THE FRONT SEAT WITH DAD ALWAYS. My family and I have tried a variety of various barriers & backseat hammock-type things... nothing has contained her; she always finds a way over. I finally purchased this thing and it actually works! She still will try to put her feet on top of it, but she cannot get over the barrier and then usually gives up and lays down in the back. I've had it now for about 3-4 months and waited to write a review until I was sure it was a keeper, and it is!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S

customer_reviews.title: Could not find a way to anchor the barrier's lower half.
customer_reviews.text: Our vehicle is a 2013 Toyota RAV4 and despite trying the multiple anchoring options given by Petfect, I could not find what I felt would be a satisfactory way to attach the lower half of the barrier. As a result, I returned this product. Spent more time trying to get the barrier to fit then I did on the return process. One suggestion for Petfect: revise the instructions. Some of the photos were too dark to see any clear details.
customer_reviews.author: LJ Han

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, works great
customer_reviews.text: I had something similar from another company and it kept falling down, my dogs were getting tangled in the straps, it was annoying and unsafe. I ordered this same day shipping because I was just fed up with the old one. When it arrived, I went out to the garage and installed it with a flashlight in the dark in about five minutes. It was simple to install and has stayed up and stood up to my two rambunctious puppers.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Watson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install & works
customer_reviews.text: The barrier was easy to install even without reading the directions. As should be obvious, it prevents a dog from going THROUGH the space between seats. A high energy dog can go over the barrier, so you may need a back seat tether & harness in addition to this. (As I do with Ciaran the Car Monster.) An additional benefit is it only takes a couple minutes to move to a different vehicle, if you need to.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good barrier
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd dog barrier, and it is the better one I've found. It clips conveniently to the headrest, but it took a little time to get the bottom hooked under the seat. The only thing I dislike about the barrier is the height- I wish it was higher as one of my dogs can still stick her face over.
customer_reviews.author: CindelT

customer_reviews.title: Great for small dogs!!
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for us...we have 3 little dogs that travel with us. Until now, they all wanted to be in the front passenger seat with me, and it was a constant battle . As soon as I installed this Petfect pet barrier, they understood the game was up. Not happy the first day, whining and carrying on like the spoiled brats they are. Second day...peace and quiet, they lay down and went to sleep! Hubby and I looked at each other and said WHY didn't we buy this sooner!! It's well made, easy to install/uninstall. Might not deter a big dog, but for our littles it is wonderful 😀😀
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feel safer driving
customer_reviews.text: Works to keep our 15 lb poodle and 30 lb labradoodle in the back seat. Did take a few corrections. Had trouble finding anchor placements for the bottom. We feel safer driving as the girls wanted to co-pilot on the center console. I think larger or more I’ll behaved dogs would need a higher and stronger barrier.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: A strong, determined dog can push the center down, and lean into the front seat.
customer_reviews.text: I love the easy installation! We have just rescued two lab/mix sisters from South Carolina. They LOVE to ride in the car, but want to sit in the front seat to help me drive!!! I installed the back seat barrier, but Gracie has decided to put her front paws on the top and lean into the front seat to lick my face while I'm driving. It appears that a bit more structural integrity across the top would prevent her from leaning into the front seat. I'm wondering if it's possible to insert something to prevent it from sagging .... otherwise, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Protects the dogs from coming into front ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Protects the dogs from coming into front seat. I have a big golden retriever that sits on the backseat in the middle and sticks his head between the center console and drools onto the console. We put this up to keep him from putting his head between the 2 seats and drooling on the console. It works well. Keeps him back and protects console from scratches and drool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps our Bulldog safely in the back seat!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping our bulldog in the back seat! It was impossible to drive with him unless he sat on a lap until we got this seat divider. I'm sure he could make it over/through it when he gets a little bigger but this has helped him get comborfable riding in the back by himself. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PETFECT = Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I realize every car/seat is different but we were able to attach the barrier to our 2018 VW Atlas with no problems at all, and easily adjusted it for a perfect fit. Our English Bulldog isn't a fan of the product, but only because it works exactly as intended :) Additionally, the seller was extremely responsive and helpful in answering my follow up question. Would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DeArBe

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to install in our Toyota Sienna, except the vehicle seats didn't have much to fasten the lower straps to. We ended up fastening them around the seat belt receptacles, which works OK but not quite as tight as I'd like... but it still serves as a barrier to keep our two dogs in the rear. This is not an indictment of the product, just the fact that the Toyota seats don't have much to fasten the lower straps to. The top straps went onto the headrests very easily.
customer_reviews.author: P. McCormick

customer_reviews.title: totally useless for a large dog
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no clue or instruction as to how you hook this up on the bottom. Also, totally useless for a large dog. My 75 lb. lab jumps back and forth at will. If they gave you some guidance in terms of how you hook up the bottom straps, this would be nice for a smaller dog.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Small dogs only
customer_reviews.text: Product was a looser. May work for toy or small dogs, but it was totally useless for our miniature Australian terrier, 35lbs, was over it in two minutes. Looked thru it for a minute or two, then decided to just climb over it.
customer_reviews.author: F. Kimper

customer_reviews.title: Should be mandatory for all dog owners!
customer_reviews.text: It was not easy for me to instal initially. The seller was helpful in resolving the issue. It is easy once you know how. Instructions would be helpful. That aside, the product is well made, attractive and most importantly functional. My dog no longer is standing on the console and endangering me and others. It is a huge relief. I completely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great soft barrier
customer_reviews.text: I like this dog barrier. It was easy to install. We were glad they included the long ties because the passenger side seat bottom did not have the space to wrap around anything at the left side. We have not used it with the dogs yet. Tomorrow we start on a road trip and will know how it works with dogs.
customer_reviews.author: C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good BUT-Not great for large dogs or chewers
customer_reviews.text: This product shipped well, looked exactly like the pictures, was of good quality, and easy to install. My two large dogs just walked over it. One chewed on the nylon straps and the barrier itself. I had to replace it with barrier that went all the way up to the roof of the car. Not recommended for large dogs or chewers. I do think this would great for smaller dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to attach to the seats. Our puppy tried to crawl over, but after saying "No" once, she didn't try again. Without it, she kept trying to get onto the front seat. I like that she can sit in the back seat an see through the mesh. That is one of the reasons I chose this product. Does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnie

customer_reviews.title: but if we had a bad review, we were supposed to just rate it ...
customer_reviews.text: No instructions with it! Had gaps that our dog could get through. Company sent many emails for us to rate this product, but if we had a bad review, we were supposed to just rate it on their site. Very flimsy material. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: *UPDATE* 3 years later and this think is still working well. No rips or tears, even with my dog scratching at it and trying to stand on it. It keeps him in the back and is very easy to put up and take down when necessary. This is perfect to keep your dog in the back seat and off your lap while driving. It's also strong enough for him to hop up and hang over it if he wants to be part of the front seat conversation :)
customer_reviews.author: Suzzers13

customer_reviews.title: Might work for some dogs....
customer_reviews.text: ...but not ours. He just went over the top of it. Additionally, one of the clips used to secure the straps didn't work for some reason. I ended up having to tie the strap to the headrest. Additionally, this item appears to be designed for full-size vehicles, SUVs. It was a little big for our crossover SUV. Which didn't help keep the dog confined.
customer_reviews.author: Harbour Sands

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to keep one of my dogs from jumping into the front seat or sitting on the console. This barrier was so easy to install. It has mesh so I can still see my dogs. It also has a vent for the heater/AC that goes in the back. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Karol R

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: My 80 lb. Goldendoodle loves to put his paws on the console of the front seat, and since he's big its hard to push him back. Can't see to the right when driving, needed a solution. Put this up and now he stays behind it. Easy to install, one bottom hook doesn't really fit anywhere but I got it to stay. This works!
customer_reviews.author: Janet N.

customer_reviews.title: My dog and I love this product.
customer_reviews.text: My dog and I love this product. It keeps my active Labrador Retriever safely in the back seat without blocking my view. He can still see me but no longer tries to jump into my lap while I am driving.
customer_reviews.author: Sharky

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I was using thick rubber bands and made a net out of it to block the center space where my dog could come to the front and interfere with my driving. I put the Dog Car Back Seat Barrier on this morning and it fits perfectly, like it is part of the car accessory. It is a great improvement from my rubber band net!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Chen Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Confusing directions!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way that it covered the front seat area, but the directions for attaching the bottom was very confusing. My dog was able to get through the sides and get back into the front seat and I still don't know how to fix the bottom!
customer_reviews.author: Mary C. King

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit properly
customer_reviews.text: In theory good and it works. Ecspecially for price. It has large gaps on side. I rigged it up to work. But it works and it is durable fabric
customer_reviews.author: Jennylynne

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for non-hyperactive dogs
customer_reviews.text: Actually prevents a 105 lb dog from crossing over and is pretty easy to attach/remove. Beats the heavy, cumbersome, aluminium based barrier I used to have which was a pain to get on/off, kept toppling over and left marks in my roof.
customer_reviews.author: Ankit

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I received this dog Petfect backseat barrier and had it installed in 10 minutes. I've used it for about three weeks and it does keep my dog in the backseat where she belongs. She lays on the backseat and looks through the mesh opening to see me and seems to be real satisfied. My dog is a Parson Russell Terrier and weighs 31 pounds. I am real satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eggs

customer_reviews.title: maybe a bench seat would work better than our captains chairs
customer_reviews.text: Unstable in our mini van, maybe a bench seat would work better than our captains chairs. The barrier itself is well-made, it just doesn't hold in place on the bottom the way we needed it to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fans

customer_reviews.title: Great safety product to contain your pet!
customer_reviews.text: Well made product that does a great job of containing your pet. Very nice appearance that doesn’t look cheap in your vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We haven't use it yet,but it looks like it will do what we want it to do and it was very reasonable,looks good
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay put.
customer_reviews.text: Can be slid to the side to weasel through. Needs hand stitching possibly to stop this. We will see...
customer_reviews.author: Renee Gietzen

customer_reviews.title: Not for small dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work for chihuahuas they will jump over it or go around it or just crawl under the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Yvone

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, transfer, and it is effective.
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive item keeps my 32 pound Terrier mix in the back of the car, where he belongs. Unlike what I had before, he doesn't even try to get in the front because this seems so formidable.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Stuart M. Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Not like the picture!
customer_reviews.text: I disliked how hard it was to install and how cheap it looked once installed. It definitely wasn't made for a Honda CRV!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for now to keep the labradingus in the back seat. Normally she tries to get into the front, but this helped today. I am not sure that she won't try to get past the divider in the future. The straps are long and east to adjust. It was pretty easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Freckledspoon

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It does it's job of keeping me dogs in the back. It even withstands the weight of my smaller dog (15lbs) who puts his front paws up on it. The only reason it is not a 5 is because it was a bit of a pain to connect it at the bottom. It is out if the way, so I just leave it up.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda F.

customer_reviews.title: Better for a SUV
customer_reviews.text: Would definitely worm better for a SUV or truck. Not a small car.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaMae

customer_reviews.title: Fits a 2018 Grand Cherokee Trailhawk
customer_reviews.text: Not many products for 2018 Trailhawks, at least not advertised. I can attest this one truly fits mine perfectly. Be aware the straps on the headrest will be visible since it doesn’t decline fully. Great deal on an accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Aspiring Craftsman

customer_reviews.title: It installs easily and can be adjusted with the adjustable straps if ...
customer_reviews.text: This device does what it's designed to do.. It installs easily and can be adjusted with the adjustable straps if necessary .My dog weighs 13lbs and this barrier keeps her from climbing back and forth..Looks nice and the vents can keep air flowing and you can see what's going on in the back seat...Would recommend and buy again if anything happens to this one..
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Lily

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and so far has stopped the dogs from trying to get into the front seat. The back seats fold down in my Kia Forte hatchback so their heads are a little higher above the barrier than I would like. But, so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: The barrier is nice but the straps can be torn too easily
customer_reviews.text: The barrier itself is heavy and decent quality, but the straps that hold it to the seats didn't last a week. My dog is about 70lbs and the straps should have at least been rated for that or more.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Riding around
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was needing. Keep my dogs in their area but they can still see me.
customer_reviews.author: marg

customer_reviews.title: This sucks
customer_reviews.text: If your dog weighs more than 20 pounds then don’t get this. Save your money and buy a metal one. I have to give this one star or it won’t let me post it
customer_reviews.author: randy west

customer_reviews.title: Not a good design, buy a hard cage divider
customer_reviews.text: Looks ok, straps didnt stay tight. Dog leaned right on it and it came loose.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Cameron

customer_reviews.title: 😒
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money on this my Siberian Husky tore through it in seconds
customer_reviews.author: kalliope m jaffey

customer_reviews.title: Light weight decider
customer_reviews.text: This back seat barrier worked perfectly for me. I was not looking for something big and bulky. The fact that this barrier is there is enough to stop our 40 lb Austrian Labrodoodle. A stronger or more intent dog would "break through" the barrier. The directions for attaching the bottom section are not existent.
customer_reviews.author: Ketchum

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the barrier's effectiveness in keeping our Eskie in ...
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the barrier's effectiveness in keeping our Eskie in the back of our SUV. One criticism is that we could not find a way to attach the bottom straps to secure the lower section. As such, I am giving this 4 stars. Otherwise, this did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: DrPat

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought one sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I didn't get one sooner! I love my dogs, but I can't have them getting on my lap or behind my back while I am driving. I can now take them with me more often because I have the barrier and also seat belt them in the back seat.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This works good at keeping my dogs in the back seat.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I have two big dogs which are constantly in the water or out running around fields. It has protected the seats very well. It is also really good for protection when hauling other people around when we are moving from one place on the river to another in their waders. Well worth the expense!
customer_reviews.author: reelntrout

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Broke within two days. Would have liked it if it lasted I think.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole N

customer_reviews.title: Not good for husky puppies
customer_reviews.text: It was fairly easy to install but didn’t fit my Subaru exactly. It lasted a few weeks until my husky puppy chewed through one of the sides. He could also pop over the barrier...
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: No more fighting with back seat pup driver!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and VERY effective. Our femal Lhasa is insistent on being up front and in the driver's lap. This prevents that fight while ensuring she can still see us and get air. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Norman

customer_reviews.title: It was great and did exactly what I was looking for with ...
customer_reviews.text: It was great and did exactly what I was looking for with my French Bulldog from jumping from back seat to the console.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Keeps our two german shepherds out of the front of our Toyota 4runner. Good quality for the price. We spend a lot of time road tripping and camping, so this is perfect for our long journeys. Would recommend to others with pups.
customer_reviews.author: HelenofTravel

customer_reviews.title: Why no instructions on installing on slide rails??
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product but have no idea how to install lower straps to slide rail of 2009 Honda Civic. Thus, while is a worthwhile product, it is not installed properly.
customer_reviews.author: Ron H

customer_reviews.title: Pet Barrier
customer_reviews.text: Does not really fit well but has deterred the dogs from trying to come in the front seat while I am driving so suits the purpose
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Angel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install in my Forester
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. Easy to install in my Forester, high enough that my Short Hairp doesn't try to go over it. I'm pleased with it, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: bllib

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit in my car. The product is really ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t fit in my car. The product is really flimsy—if you have a young dog that’s a chewer, he will chew it. When I realized how cheap this was, I ended up buying dog hammock, which does the trick and covers the backseat. Oh, and this is one of those companies that spams you after for a review.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: It works and keeps my clingy lab in the back seat. The bottom straps are not long enough to fasten to the edge on Mazda 3 but the top tension keeps her back. Make the straps longer and it'd be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: RRE

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits okay in Honda Pilot but blocks some of the back seat users ability to use controls
customer_reviews.author: jane doe

customer_reviews.title: Better than what I had
customer_reviews.text: Dog can poke his head between the seats and sides.
customer_reviews.author: R. Partin

customer_reviews.title: Dog
customer_reviews.text: The top strap was too small but the barrier OK
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: My little terrier could still get his head thru the side. I couldn’t get it right at first..had to adjust the seat. But altogether I feel that the distraction and safety has much improved.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. It keeps the dogs in the back seat with no problems. It is much better than the bars that you see in some SUVs. It got my Chevy Cruise perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect application to keep my border collie in the back ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect application to keep my border collie in the back seat. I like the 4 straps and 2 bungee cords, used them all.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Lickfield

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Lower straps and bungee aren’t the easiest to attach.
customer_reviews.text: It keeps the dog back so that’s a plus. Bottom hook up isn’t all that easy.
customer_reviews.author: Reilly

customer_reviews.title: fit function fashionable
customer_reviews.text: the material is more than adequate for my 2 12 pound poodles to be contained. I am fitting this into a 2013 Camaro, and so far it looks as though it will work fine......more will be revealed
customer_reviews.author: satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job!
customer_reviews.text: Stops my large dog from hopping in the front seat and messing up my leather. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: lasted 1/2 a day. my dog jumps right over it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: Secures and fits nicely between the front seats, keeping my dog safe in the back seat and yet allows my her to see me through the screen. Additionally the lower screen allows air to pass through and cool the rear passenger area of the car. A very easy installation!
customer_reviews.author: Guslowski

customer_reviews.title: Worked great and our long drive was much easier with two ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and our long drive was much easier with two dogs. We didn't have to constantly push them back to the back seat.
customer_reviews.author: Braintired

customer_reviews.title: Useless For My Car
customer_reviews.text: First off this product comes with no instructions. Secondly if you have nothing to harness the lower clips to it is useless. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: OrangeCuse1

customer_reviews.title: Spend money elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Would not reccomend buying. Lasted less than a month. The sewing on the straps isn’t strong whatsoever and came undone.
customer_reviews.author: LizzyBee

customer_reviews.title: Materials are more substantial than competitors.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for keeping rambunctious dog out of the front seats.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all at least in my Honda pickup ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work at all at least in my Honda pickup. You can't get it tight enough and/or the dog will just go through or hop over it.
customer_reviews.author: Lbaba

customer_reviews.title: seat belt
customer_reviews.text: works great but would not be for a very tall dog say great dane
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Franusich JR

customer_reviews.title: It also lets the ac get to the back and cool it. The only downside is my dog just ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely kept my dogs in the backseat instead of my having to fight to push them back from between the seats. It also lets the ac get to the back and cool it. The only downside is my dog just pushed over the top of it once we had reached our destination so he could get out thru the front seat. But that is a behavior issue not really a product issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to use in his car for his dog, he loves it. He said it works wonders. He highly recommends.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Kennard

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the safety of my dogs, in the car!
customer_reviews.text: I like it!! It did the job for the 12 and 14 pounders but, the 6 pound Minpin found a way to get past it!!
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I travel with my 2 dogs frequently. This barrier is exactly what I needed!! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: The Knapps

customer_reviews.title: Back Seat Barrier
customer_reviews.text: This holds up better than others I've tried in the past. It's a great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Searcy

customer_reviews.title: Works great, difficult to secure
customer_reviews.text: Great size but a little difficult to clip. The bungee cord clips on the bottom aren’t suitable for all car seats. But with a little creativity I was able to secure it. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Merrick Sadler

customer_reviews.title: Works for smaller dogs
customer_reviews.text: Its a bit finicky to fit at first but it works for a small dog and as other reviewers have said its probably not for big dogs
customer_reviews.author: BallaghMan

customer_reviews.title: have only tried it in Traverse and it fit fine however have not tried it on dogs yet or ...
customer_reviews.text: I am giving 4 stars right now! I bought 2, have only tried it in Traverse and it fit fine however have not tried it on dogs yet or put in the truck!!! Will post more in due time!
customer_reviews.author: Diana L.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not to happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Not to happy with it, there is a gap in it on the sides, so your pet can come through. I wouldn't order again

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the dogs in the backseat. Their Scottie mixes ...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the dogs in the backseat. Their Scottie mixes, just so you know the size. Use both a truck and small car

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping dog from jumping in front seat.
customer_reviews.text: This worked great on our first trip using it. It kept our Shih Tzu from jumping in the front seat.

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Effective and easy way to keep your pets in the back seat area.
customer_reviews.author: James Johnsen

product_meta.title: PETFECT Dog Car Back Seat Barrier - Lightweight, Durable & Perfect for Pets w/Upper Eye-Contact Net
feature_bullets: Quick & Easy to Install with just one hand - Now your animal family member can travel with you wherever you drive!!
Features advanced lower net venting to keep the rear of your car at the ideal temperature for everyone’s comfort
Special upper net allows you to have eye contact with everyone in the backseat which is so important for comfort & reassurance
Durable & easy to clean - Scratch resistance means you can use over & over again & throw it in your washing machine when dirty for a ’good as new’ look
Forms a comprehensive barrier between the front & back areas of your auto vehicle - the safest and most comfortable way for your whole family to travel!!!
